MajorClaims.Text: There will have many disadvantages if the workers work at home

Claims.Text: Mitigating process, no interaction and pressure are these things people should examine when they want to work at home
Doing all jobs at home don't make employees attempt to work like this
Computers and modems bring works to home but these still have many things distract their mind
Interaction has been an advantage for workers at offices

Premises.Text: Each office has its rules that keep workers do their job as effectively as possible
The directors manage employers and give them the deadline of projects
Then again, the workers must try their best to finish the time limit
Facebook or Yahoo have been the entertaining websites, however, they are the reasons why people cannot concentrate on their job
The dos and don't at office play important role to prevent these things from workers
doing all jobs alone makes employees fall asleep easily
The best condition might not be good for people
Discussing and debating Projects together increase working ability
all we know that the target can be reached fast thanks to working of many people
interaction help employees improve their communicational skills
they will have more and more friends and relationships
Interaction is a factor increasing working quality
